The webAppOS Debugger app demonstrates how third-party apps and web pages can access web memory of an active webAppOS project.

In webAppOS, there are at least two modules ("users") accessing web memory, the server and the browser. To enable access to a greater number of user, set the value of the max_users_per_project setting in webappos.properties to at least 3.

Look at the Debugger app source to find out how to connect to existing web memory.

More info can be found here.
